Hydras:

"Take care, my dear"he said softly "I know by experience what is the 
Rust Plague... and I don't like lost you...."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:


> In a message dated 3/10/03 11:43:54 AM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "The rust plague, my dear Maxima means our death... That plague 
rust 
> > our metallic bodies and consume our cicuits and cause us the 
> > death... and horible death by the way... that's you are running 
> > away, my dear,... you're running away of death..."
> > 
> > 
> 
> She skittered to a halt. Turning around to look at the base. 'A 
rust plague?' 
> she thought. Then she remembered... Megatron went through such an 
ordeal many 
> years ago. They nearly lost their leader to such a devastating 
disease. 
> 
> With every fiber of her being, both technical & organic screamed 
out in a 
> primal fear of this wicked ruthless thing. 
> 
> >"Understood,"< her feline voice replied in a less edgy or serious 
tone, but 
> softer & more... slightly compassionate sounding. 
> 
> She wondered how much it had evolved or devolved since last she 
heard of the 
> disease. 
> 
> Either way... the technical part of her was in severe danger. The 
Organic 
> side was fine & safe. 
> 
> She glanced off in the direction of northeast. She had one idea... 
in which 
> it would be dangerous. Somehow, she had to make sure no one would 
follow her 
> to destroy those she 'cared' about the most. 
> 
> >"If you have not heard from... fear not. I shall be fine."< A 
little more 
> softly. >"I'll find away to stop this madness. Promise."<
